Podcast

Distillery Nation Podcast #11 - The TTB Permit

Ilias goes over what it took to get his TTB permit

This is a solo episode and I’m going over my process of obtaining my TTB permit for a Distilled Spirits Plant. I cover topics around the overall process, what where some of the issues I hit and overall from start to finish my experience with getting my approval along with the documentation aspect and why I had to lock-up the DSP.

Listen to the TTB Permit Episode

LINKS AND RESOURCES MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODE


Main TTB website: ttb.gov

Required TTB documenation: ttb.gov

Advice from Ilias - Take your time filling the applicaton, I know I did!


Thanks for Listening!

Thanks so much for joining me again this month. Have some feedback you’d like to share? Leave a note in the comment section below!

If you enjoyed this episode, please share it with your friends.

Also, please leave an honest review for The Distillery Nation Podcast on iTunes! Ratings and reviews are extremely helpful and greatly appreciated! They do matter in the rankings of the show, and I read each and every one of them.

About This Site

Mastrogiannis distillery is a small batch family owned and operated Greek brandy distillery located in Lakewood, WA. More ›
